title: Mostly Adequate Guide
description: A french translation of the 'Mostly Adequate Guide To Functional Programming' written by Dr.Boolean

title: Soldier Z
description: An attempt to build a complete and complexe game in browser among JavaScript technologies. The game is still in development and is probably one of the most challenging project I ever tried.

title: Kattebel
description: Hackathon of one day at The Smiths. The idea was to build from scratch a smart watch application for both iOS and Android altogether with a little web app and a corresponding backend that feeds them all. I was in charge of the backend side built with Parse and Express.

title: Moovup
description: Moovup is a web-application on which I worked on during more or less eight months. I was working for the start-up on my free time, in order to help them to technically set-up their project.

title: The Ocean Cleanup
description: Bug fix,  port from iOS to Android and complete features on the app (Notifications, GPS tracking). The app takes place in The Ocean CleanUp project in order to give people on boat a way to constitute a set of exploitable data.

title: ti.es6
description: A Titanium plugin used to make Titanium & Alloy apps compatible with ES6
